actionDeleteMessage() - Method in class UI.Custom.MessageSpeechBubble

ActiveChatItem(String, String, String, String, String, Color, int, boolean) - Constructor for class pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerClient.ActiveChatItem
Parameterized constructor method, that receives the username, display name, message preview, message status, contact group, contact group color, chatID, and last message seen of an active chat.

This class creates an active chat selection panel.

addContact(String) - Method in class pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerClient
Adds a contact to the contacts database (Adds a saved contacts).
addContactType(String, String) - Method in class pengu.database.ContactsDBCommunicator
Adds a contact type to the contact type table.
addMessageInboxReference(int, String) - Method in class pengu.database.MessageDBCommunicator
Adds a In-box/Message reference to the In-box table
addPrivateKey(String, Date, Date, String) - Method in class pengu.database.ContactsDBCommunicator
Adds a Private Key to the local Private Key table.
addPublicKey(int, String, Date, Date) - Method in class pengu.database.ContactsDBCommunicator
Adds a Public Key for a specified user.
addPublicKey(String, String, String) - Method in class pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerRESTClient
Makes a request to add a public key to the server.
addReceivedMessage(String, String, int) - Method in class pengu.database.MessageDBCommunicator
Adds a received message into the Received Messages table and creates a chat with the user if one has not been created yet.
addSentMessage(int, String, int) - Method in class pengu.database.MessageDBCommunicator
Adds a sent message to the Sent Messages database and places it on the Out-box table.
addUser(String) - Method in class pengu.database.ContactsDBCommunicator
Adds a user to the contacts list table.

APICommunicator.Request - Class in pengu.messenger
